nodes.text: The mother of Velko Jahen was a female Gagic Soikan. Her daughter with a Livtak defector inherited the typical coloration of a Livtak. As a result, when Jahen took a post on the Starlight Beacon space station, Head of Security Ghal Tarpfen initially assumed she had fought for the Livtak Union in the Soikan conflict instead of the Gagic Alliance.
